txt.en: You have discovered the Destroyed Monument of Castamir, toppled by those who wish to forget the reign of the Usurper.

You have discovered the Monument of King Telumehtar, who raised the Gondorian fleet anew and attacked Umbar by land and sea.
You have discovered the Statue of Thorongil, erected for a mysterious man who sailed to Umbar and sacked the city of the Corsairs, then resigned his service to the Steward and disappeared.
